newsitem.title: POLAND: WARSAW BOURSE ADDS AGROS TO WIG 20 INDEX.
newsitem.headline: WARSAW BOURSE ADDS AGROS TO WIG 20 INDEX.

text.p: The Warsaw bourse added the food trader and producer Agros Holding SA to its WIG 20 index of large-cap, high-volume stocks and removed food trader and producer Animex , the bourse said in a statement.
It said the change would go into effect on October 15.
The other 19 stocks in the WIG 20 include: BPH , Bank Slaski , Elektrim , Stomil Olsztyn , Stalexport , BRE , Debica , Gorazdze and WBK .
Also on the list are: Budimex , Zywiec , BIG , Universal , Kety , Wedel , Polifarb Cieszyn , Rolimpex and Mostostal Export and Okocim .
The bourse updates the list every quarter.
